PENDING_CONTENT_1: We are processing your order. The transaction might take longer than usual due to your bank service.
PENDING_CONTENT_2: Once your bank approves your order we will call you within 6 hours to verify your order. An order confirmation email will also be sent to your email address
SUCESS_CALL_YOU: We will call you within 6 hours to verify your order. An order confirmation email has been sent to your email address
MEMBER_CHECKOUT_DESC: Shopped with us before? Please sign in to your Leflair account for express checkout, or proceed with Facebook.
GUEST_CHECKOUT_DESC: New to Leflair? Welcome! Enter your information below to check out.
GUEST_CHECKOUT_DESC_SHORT: Checkout without creating an account. You can still become a member later
